node.title: Luther ticks 1.6km jetty swim off his bucket list. His motto? Never give up
node.alt: A man in wheelchair with a swimming cap, with two women also in swimming caps. Outside.
node.description: Luther Frost-Barnes is blind andÂ uses a wheelchair, but that hasn't stopped him finishing one of WA's most iconic swimming races.
node.content:
["Everyone\u00a0who takes part in the annual swim along\u00a0the longest timber jetty in the southern hemisphere should be proud,\u00a0but Luther Frost-Barnes has more reason than most.\u00a0", "The 29-year-old, who has cerebral palsy and is legally blind, uses a wheelchair because of limited use of his limbs.", "At the Busselton Jetty event, he\u00a0took part in the \"mile swim\"\u00a0\u2014 1.6\u00a0kilometres from the end of the jetty to the shore.", "Frost-Barnes was not unique in attempting the jetty swim for the first time. A\u00a0record 3,576 swimmers entered the swim on Sunday\u00a0morning.", "", "
Swimmers in the water at the event.(ABC South West WA: Georgia Loney)
", "Open-water champion Kyle Lee broke the record for the headline Busselton Jetty event, achieving the 3.6km\u00a0swim around the jetty in\u00a038 minutes 59 seconds, and Jaime Bowler won the women's leg in 44\u00a0minutes 48 seconds.", "Others were also celebrating their hard-won victories.", "Frost-Barnes completed the \"mile-swim\"\u00a0\u2014\u00a0one\u00a0length of the jetty \u2014 in just over an hour,\u00a0despite having limited use of his legs, and on his first attempt.", "", "
Spectators at the Busselton Jetty Swim.(ABC South West: Georgia Loney)
", "
Just swim, swim, swim
", "Frost-Barnes, a personal trainer, emerged from the water to cheers.", "His biggest\u00a0challenge was\u00a0coping with the waves washing over him\u00a0as he swam.", "", "
Frost-Barnes is helped from the water following his first jetty swim(Supplied: Bonnie English Evans)
", "Frost-Barnes\u00a0said his commitment didn't waver and he never had\u00a0any doubt\u00a0 he would finish the swim.", "His triumph came after months of single-minded training", "\"No, it hasn't been difficult \u2026\u00a0I'm committed to swimming the jetty,\" he said.", "", "
Frost-Barnes competes in the event.(ABC South West WA: Georgia Loney)
", "Frost-Barnes trained for months, supported by coach Sandra Walker, who slowly built up the distance and introduced him to ocean swimming.", "\"I wish most people had the same dedication and enthusiasm, he's just absolutely inspirational and I'm very proud of him,\" Walker said.\u00a0", "Frost-Barnes\u00a0was supported in the water by physiotherapist Anna Foley who lifted him from his wheelchair into the water, and swam along him every stroke of the way.\u00a0", "
Swimming, skiing and diving
", "Lorraine Frost-Barnes said her son had always pushed his body to the limit \u2013 he had done downhill skiing in Thredbo, and had his underwater diving certificate.", "\"He's getting that triangular kite-shaped back, which is typical of a swimmer, and he's very muscular \u2014\u00a0his ego's huge,\"\u00a0she joked.", "", "
Swimmers prepare to take to the water.(ABC South West WA: Georgia Loney)
", "Intense physical exercise allowed Luther to have better control of his body outside the pool, she said.", "\"Where he's in a wheelchair, he's not using his legs that much, so they switch off \u2026 you have to manipulate his toes and move his legs.", "\"We're actually seeing\u00a0big progress in how he's now developing and at age 29, that's pretty amazing.\"", "Ms Frost-Barnes said exercise allowed Luther to appreciate what his body could do, despite limitations imposed by cerebral palsy.", "
Bucket list
", "Frost-Barnes said the jetty was part of his bucket list, which included\u00a0skydiving and rock climbing.", "He said his motto was \"never give up\" and his next challenge would be to complete the longer 3.6km\u00a0swim around the jetty.\u00a0", "\"[I'm going to]\u00a0keep training in the pool and the gym,\"\u00a0he said."]
